title: Remove Important Information disclaimer from Visa Check page

requirements.text: Remove the 'Important Information' disclaimer block from the Australian Visa Status Check screen so that none of the following text appears anywhere on that page: 'Important Information', 'This is a mock visa status check system for demonstration purposes only', 'Status information is managed by authenticated users', and 'For official visa information, please contact the relevant government authorities'.

quotes:
Important Information
• This is a mock visa status check system for demonstration purposes only

• Status information is managed by authenticated users

• For official visa information, please contact the relevant government authorities

acceptanceCriteria: On the 'Australian Visa Status Check' page, the 'Important Information' card/section is no longer rendered.
A text search of the rendered 'Australian Visa Status Check' page does not show any of the removed disclaimer bullet lines.
All other functionality on the page (form submission, results display, reset behavior) remains unchanged.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything in frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Do not change backend logic, schemas, or APIs for application status checking.
Do not add new disclaimer content or new external links as part of this change.
